message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $110. I think it would be very valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of a price more around $90. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand your position, Bob, but $90 is a bit too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $100?
I understand your position, and I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to consider that?
